ai-thig5.11:2.2_0: one that does not plague you.
ai-thig5.11:2.4_0: sit in a discreet place to meditate.
ai-thig5.11:3.4_0: and retired to a discreet place.
ai-thig5.11:4.1_0: In the first watch of the night,
ai-thig5.11:4.3_0: In the middle watch of the night,
ai-thig5.11:4.5_0: In the last watch of the night,
ai-thig5.11:4.6_0: they shattered the mass of darkness.
ai-thig5.11:5.1_0: They rose and paid homage at her feet:
ai-thig5.11:5.4_0: as the thirty gods honor Sakka,
ai-thig5.11:5.6_0: master of the three knowledges, without defilements.”
ai-thig5.11:6.1_0: That is how thirty senior nuns declared their enlightenment in the presence of Paṭācārā.
